text: A ventricle is one of two large chambers toward the bottom of the heart that collect and pushes blood received from an atrium towards the body and lungs.Left Ventricle - Cell Centered Database ==See also== * Wiggers diagram ==References== ==External links== * Photo of dissection at uc.edu * Left Ventricle â€“ Cell Centered Database * Category:Heart Category:Cardiovascular system Category:Anatomy of the cardiovascular system
title: Ventricle (heart)
